days.title: Mineral Formation - How Crystals Grow
days.learning_objective: Explore geological processes while understanding how mineral science enables technology development and sustainable resource management.

days.title: Performance Art - The Artist as the Art
days.learning_objective: Explore embodied expression while understanding how performance art enables social commentary, identity exploration, and cultural dialogue.

days.title: Pressure and Vacuum - The Power of Empty Space
days.learning_objective: Understand pressure differentials while exploring how vacuum technology enables manufacturing, space exploration, and scientific instruments.

days.title: Innovation Legacy - How Ideas Change the World
days.learning_objective: Analyze long-term impact while understanding how innovations create lasting social, economic, and environmental consequences requiring ethical consideration.

days.title: World Wars - Global Conflicts and Their Impact
days.learning_objective: Understand global conflict while exploring how international cooperation and institutions can prevent war and protect human rights.

days.title: Mathematical Patterns - Order in Numbers
days.learning_objective: Explore mathematical beauty while understanding how pattern recognition enables scientific discovery, artistic expression, and technological innovation.

days.title: Mathematical Proofs - How We Know Math Is True
days.learning_objective: Understand logical reasoning while building critical thinking skills essential for evaluating evidence and resisting manipulation.

days.title: Augmented Reality - Enhancing the Real World
days.learning_objective: Explore mixed reality while understanding how AR technology affects social interaction, learning, and perception of reality.

days.title: Conceptual Art - Ideas as Art
days.learning_objective: Explore abstract expression while understanding how conceptual art challenges assumptions and enables new ways of thinking.

days.title: Plate Tectonics - The Moving Puzzle of Earth's Surface
days.learning_objective: Understand geological dynamics while exploring how Earth science research informs natural disaster preparedness and resource management.

days.title: Digital Wellness - Healthy Technology Use
days.learning_objective: Practice technology balance while understanding how digital literacy includes both utilizing and limiting technology for human flourishing.

days.title: Woodworking - Crafting with Nature's Material
days.learning_objective: Practice traditional skills while understanding how craft knowledge preserves cultural traditions and enables sustainable resource use.

days.title: Scenario Planning - Preparing for Multiple Futures
days.learning_objective: Practice strategic thinking while understanding how scenario planning enables adaptive governance and resilient community development.

days.title: Problem Solving - Finding Solutions
days.learning_objective: Master systematic problem-solving while understanding how structured approaches enable effective responses to complex social and technological challenges.

days.title: Art Criticism - Understanding and Evaluating Art
days.learning_objective: Practice critical analysis while understanding how aesthetic evaluation develops critical thinking skills applicable to media literacy and democratic deliberation.

days.title: Art History - The Story of Human Expression
days.learning_objective: Understand cultural evolution while exploring how artistic movements reflect and shape social values, political systems, and technological development.

days.title: Glaciers and Ice Ages - Earth's Frozen History
days.learning_objective: Understand climate history while exploring how paleoclimatology informs current climate science and adaptation planning.

days.title: First Aid Basics - Helping in Emergencies
days.learning_objective: Practice emergency response while understanding how community preparedness and mutual aid strengthen social resilience and collective care.

days.title: Museum Studies - Preserving and Sharing Art
days.learning_objective: Understand cultural preservation while exploring how museums can either democratize or restrict access to cultural heritage and knowledge.

days.title: Art Therapy - Healing Through Creation
days.learning_objective: Explore therapeutic creativity while understanding how artistic expression supports mental health, trauma recovery, and community healing.

days.title: Community Art - Art That Brings People Together
days.learning_objective: Practice collaborative creation while understanding how community art enables social cohesion, democratic participation, and cultural expression.

days.title: Cultural Art - Expression of Identity and Heritage
days.learning_objective: Explore cultural identity while understanding how artistic traditions preserve heritage, resist oppression, and enable intercultural dialogue.

days.title: Design Thinking - A Process for Creative Solutions
days.learning_objective: Master human-centered design while understanding how design thinking can address social challenges and enable democratic innovation.

days.title: Erosion and Weathering - How Earth Reshapes Itself
days.learning_objective: Understand geological change while exploring how Earth science knowledge informs infrastructure planning and climate adaptation.

days.title: The Scientific Method - Your Guide to Understanding Everything
days.learning_objective: Master evidence-based reasoning while understanding how scientific literacy protects against misinformation and enables informed democratic participation.

days.title: Creative Problem Solving - Thinking Outside the Box
days.learning_objective: Practice innovative thinking while understanding how creativity can address social challenges and enable adaptive responses to change.

days.title: User Experience Design - Creating for People
days.learning_objective: Practice human-centered design while understanding how technology design affects accessibility, privacy, and democratic participation.

days.title: Innovation Management - Leading Creative Teams
days.learning_objective: Practice collaborative leadership while understanding how innovation management can either democratize or concentrate technological power.

days.title: Biomimicry - Learning from Nature's Designs
days.learning_objective: Explore nature-inspired design while understanding how biomimicry enables sustainable technology and demonstrates the value of biodiversity.

days.title: Innovation Metrics - Measuring Creative Success
days.learning_objective: Practice evaluation methods while understanding how innovation measurement must include social impact, equity, and environmental sustainability.

days.title: Groundwater - Hidden Water Reserves
days.learning_objective: Understand hydrological systems while exploring how groundwater management requires international cooperation and sustainable resource governance.
